# Tokens
## Matching strings
```
^     => Start of a string
$     => End of a string
[abc] => match either a b or c
[a-c] => Match everything between a and c
.     => Match every single char
```
## Numeration
```
?     => Match zero or one
+     => one or more
*     => zero or more
{n}   => match n time
{n,m} => match between n and m times
```

# More tokens
## Special chars
```
\s    => Whitespace chars
\S    => Non-WhiteSpace chars
\w    => Word char
\d    => Digit
\b    => Word boundary
```

## Groups
```
(?:...)  => Matching group
(...)    => Group
(?#...)  => Comment group
(?=...)  => Positive lookahead
(?!...)  => Negative lookahead
(?<=...) => Positive lookbehind
(?<!...) => Negative lookbehind 
```

# Patterns

## Patterns
```python
# emails
regex = re.compile(r'''([A-Za-z0-9]+[.-_])*[A-Za-z0-9]+@[A-Za-z0-9-]+
(\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,})+''')
# domains names
regex = r'''(([\da-zA-Z])([_\w-]{,62})\.){,127}(([\da-zA-Z])[_\w-]{,61})?
([\da-zA-Z]\.((xn\-\-[a-zA-Z\d]+)|([a-zA-Z\d]{2,})))'''
# ip addresses
regex = """^((25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|[1-9]?[0-9])\.){3}(25[0-5]|2
[0-4][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|[1-9]?[0-9])$"""
# flags?
regex = r"dvCTF{\S{3,}}"
```
